solution_line_template: The clothes take {clothes_wash_time} minutes to wash and the towels take twice as long, {clothes_wash_time} x {multiplier_twice} = <<{clothes_wash_time}*{multiplier_twice}={towels_wash_time}>>{towels_wash_time} minutes to wash the towels.

The sheets take {minutes_less_sheets} minutes less than the towels, {towels_wash_time} - {minutes_less_sheets} = <<{towels_wash_time}-{minutes_less_sheets}={sheets_wash_time}>>{sheets_wash_time} minutes to wash the sheets.

It takes {clothes_wash_time} minutes + {towels_wash_time} minutes + {sheets_wash_time} minutes = <<{clothes_wash_time}+{towels_wash_time}+{sheets_wash_time}={total_wash_time}>>{total_wash_time} minutes to wash everything.
